item.title: Epstein is the one issue that persistently splits Trump from his base
item.description: Trump promised during the 2024 election to release the Justice Department’s “Epstein files,” but his administration has resisted doing so.

item.title: Lawmakers outraged by provision allowing senators to sue over Jan. 6 records
item.description: The House won’t block the bill to reopen the government over the language, but Speaker Mike Johnson said he’ll seek to undo it next week.
